snippet: Alberto Contador clinched his second Giro d’Italia title after heading into the final day with an advantage of more than two minutes.
abstract: Alberto Contador wins Giro d'Italia bicycle race to become first cyclist since 1998 to win race and Tour de France in same year.
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador clinched his second Giro d’Italia title after heading into the final day with an advantage of more than two minutes.

headline.main: Alberto Contador Wraps Up Giro d’Italia
